<style>
  /* Fullscreen, no scroll */
  html, body { margin: 0; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; }

  /* Hide Quarto's navbar/header ONLY on this page */
  header, nav, .navbar, #quarto-header { display: none !important; }

  /* Remove Quarto content padding/margins so canvas truly fills */
  main.content, .content, #quarto-content, .page-columns {
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    max-width: none !important;
  }

  /* Where Three mounts */
  #three-root {
    position: fixed;
    inset: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    z-index: 0;
  }
</style>

<div id="three-root"></div>
